body_html:
• separates concerns of declaration and use (less need to care about the other)
  • changes don't affect each other (data format ("${tensorflow_source_dir}/), line indentation)
  • provides clean access to other code (e.g. sharing with other build scripts)
  • enables testing (in this case, helps cleaning up outdated references)
body_text:
separates concerns of declaration and use (less need to care about the other)
changes don't affect each other (data format ("${tensorflow_source_dir}/), line indentation)
provides clean access to other code (e.g. sharing with other build scripts)
enables testing (in this case, helps cleaning up outdated references)
body:
* separates concerns of declaration and use (less need to care about the other)
* changes don't affect each other (data format (`"${tensorflow_source_dir}/`), line indentation)
* provides clean access to other code (e.g. sharing with other build scripts)
* enables testing (in this case, helps [cleaning up outdated references](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/10296#issuecomment-353749963))
